00033  * Initialize the class.

00035 TextFileReader::TextFileReader()
00036 {
00037 }

00041  */
00042 TextFileReader::~TextFileReader()
00043 {

00046 /*
00047  * Read the entire file, the header and body.
00048  */
00049 void TextFileReader::ReadFile(const std::string &fileName, std::map<std::string, std::string> &textData)
00050 {
00051         textData.clear();
00052         std::ifstream fileStream;
00053         Fs::aptOpen(fileStream, fileName);
00054         if (!fileStream)
00055         {
00056                 affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileNotFoundException e(L"Calvin",L"Default Description, Please Update!",affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,0);
00057                 throw e;
00058         }
00059         ReadFileBody(fileStream, textData);
00060         fileStream.close();
00061 }
00062 
00063 /*
00064  * Read the contents of the file using the input file stream.
00065  */
00066 void TextFileReader::ReadFile(std::ifstream &fileStream, std::map<std::string, std::string> &textData)
00067 {
00068         ReadFileBody(fileStream, textData);
00069 }
00070 
00071 /*
00072  * Read the file body. Each line of the file should contain
00073  * either a comment, blank line or name=value parameter.
00074  * Comment lines start with a # sign.
00075  */
00076 void TextFileReader::ReadFileBody(std::ifstream &fileStream, std::map<std::string, std::string> &textData)
00077 {
00078         const int MAX_LINE_LENGTH = 1024;
00079         char line[MAX_LINE_LENGTH];
00080         std::string name;
00081         std::string value;
00082 
00083         // Read each line and store only the name/value parameters.
00084         while (fileStream.getline(line, MAX_LINE_LENGTH))
00085         {
00086                 if (line[0] == '#')
00087                         continue;
00088 
00089                 while (strlen(line) > 0 && iscntrl(line[strlen(line)-1]))
00090                 {
00091                         line[strlen(line)-1] = 0;
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 char *index = strchr(line, '=');
00095                 if (index)
00096                 {
00097                         value = (index+1);
00098                         line[ strlen(line) - strlen(index)] = 0;
00099                         name = line;
00100                         textData[name] = value;
00101                 }
00102         }
00103 }
